page.title: 04Tuxford Comp. School 4
page.content:
R.O.S.L.A. Block is l3 years old and the Lower School is 9 years old. 5. There are forty eight and a half teachers in the I.S.U. and the USU one works part time.
6. There are 32O pupils in the L.S.U. and 54O in the U.S.U.
7. There are 25O on average meals served in the L.S.U. and 4OO a day in the U.S.U.
CLASSROOMS
There are two groups of five classrooms situated at diagonally opposite ends of the building. Wing Area (South) is for first year pupils and Wing Area (North) is for second year pupils. Each wing area has its
